testcase.name: brockenLinkMethod

failure.message: The following asserts failed: Links = https://demoqa.com/bad-request is brocken with status code = 400 Response message = Bad Request expected [true] but found [false], Links = https://demoqa.com/unauthorized is brocken with status code = 401 Response message = Unauthorized expected [true] but found [false], Links = https://demoqa.com/forbidden is brocken with status code = 403 Response message = Forbidden expected [true] but found [false], Links = https://demoqa.com/invalid-url is brocken with status code = 404 Response message = Not Found expected [true] but found [false]
